external_games.name: Geronimo Stilton in the Kingdom of Fantasy
Geronimo Stilton in the Kingdom of Fantasy

name: Geronimo Stilton in the Kingdom of Fantasy
summary: Meet Geronimo Stilton, editor of the Rodent’s Gazette, the most important newspaper in New Mouse City. Join Geronimo Stilton on a colourful quest through the Kingdom of Fantasy as he tackles puzzles, brain-teasers and action-packed challenges. Enjoy a fascinating and gripping story based on the hit books that will enthral children and parents alike.
